name: Munchkittens
description:
Serve customers the new specialty dish, Cat Donuts!  🐈  Throw the correct color donut (white, orange or purple) matching the center of customer's plates, and achieve the highest score! Get three correct hits to trigger an animation!

Controls:
Mouse click - Throw donut 🍩
Mouse position affects throw trajectory.

Credits:
Han_jh - Developer
doodletofu - Developer
Mint - 2D & 3D Artist

Music:
♪ stream cafe - boba date
Freesound.org
